void AddModuleInterfaces (Dictionary< Type, List< object >> dictionary)
 Add more than one module interface. This is usually used to copy the contents of one registry core into another.

 Add more than one module to the same interface in the registry.
bool TryRequestModuleInterface< T > (out T iface)
 Try to get a module from the interface by type. Returns false if it could not find a module.
